specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn - Yarn Effect > Fancy Yarn Fancy yarns are specialty yarns, such as feather yarn, eyelash yarn, and novelty yarn, that add unique textures and visual effects to fabrics, making them stand out.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Knit > Low Gauge Knit Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric. Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Cardigans, Partywear
